name: Lost In NanoWorld
description:
Description

Lost In Nanoworld is a 2D adventure platform game about a lost nanorobot trying to find his way among dangers, introducing player to nanophysics rules.

Lost in Nanoworld is a game based on nanophysic. It takes place in a world inspired by corals and all kind of life at this scale. There are obstacles to overcome thanks to your agility and to Nano's abilities inspired by physics at our scale, but also there is scientific content inside. They are made to be simple and explain encountered phenomenon.

Single player

Age: 8+

Platform: Windows (Mac and Linux in the future maybe)

Controller: gamepad

Credits
